website_summaries.verdict: A quality, comfortable diaper that offers a good value for the money.
pros: With its leakguard core and comfortable fit, Luvs is a brand many parents turn to for quality at  good price
We like the secure fit and wider fastening area that makes changing faster
cons: These may not work for overnight use for all babies, as some experienced leaks when used overnight
A few consumers also felt the fragrance was too strong

customer_reviews.title: ... am a mom of four and these are our favorite diapers. When I heard they were made by ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a mom of four and these are our favorite diapers. When I heard they were made by the same people that make Pampers it was a no brainer to go with this more affordable option. My children have almost never had a diaper rash, and my youngest daughters physician was checking her out the last visit and commented that it was the cleanest looking diaper area she's ever seen. No redness, irritation, and my babies seem to like them. I also love that you can get these in the subscribe and save. It costs almost the same as Target, but the convenience factor is worth so much to me that I still prefer amazon if I plan ahead!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Luv it!
customer_reviews.text: We've lucked out and this product works great for our little girl. No issues with rashes, leaking, or excessive blow outs. We've had 3 blow outs over the past 3 months. But even with the expensive brands, blow outs happen. I love the price. With our first child we bought Huggies or Pampers and high price was painful. Now we are only spending $24 per month for diapers! I've read some negative reviews about this product, so these may not work for everyone... but they worked for us. Maybe buy a small pack and see how they work for your baby before you invest in the big box.
customer_reviews.author: j dodd

customer_reviews.title: Luvs diapers work so well!
customer_reviews.text: I am the real-life example of the slogan, "You live, you learn, and then you get Luvs." Your baby poops and pees in diapers and then you throw them away. While not all diapers are created equal, I finally tried Luvs with my 2nd baby and was pleasantly surprised that they worked just as well, if not better than, the other expensive brand I was using...especially at night. No more nighttime diapers! So with baby #3, it was a no brainier; we started out with Luvs. It's even better that we get even more savings by subscribing on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly WAY overpriced
customer_reviews.text: We really liked buying these diapers on Amazon because they were the best price per quantity diapers around. Even without the line one them to let you know when your LO has gone to the bathroom, they are quality diapers. We have been using them for 3 months now and when I went to order these again, BOOM. The price had been jacked up! DO NOT buy these diapers on Amazon. It is a waste of your money at this cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for us anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a fan of Luvs - that was all I would buy. But with their recent update in graphics, which included changing the tabs from white to purple, my son experienced skin irritation. I feel that something must have changed in their process chemically. Also, the diapers seem thinner and seemed to sag more than they used to. Unfortunately, I have switched to another brand because I'm not satisfied with Luvs anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Cristie Wynne

customer_reviews.title: The absolute worst diapers I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: The absolute worst diapers I have ever used. Despite changing my daughter frequently, she often urinates through these diapers and her clothes. I was so disappointed. I'm not sure what "second time" mom's are thinking purchasing these. They were so horrible, I didn't even give them away, I trashed them. I promptly bought Huggies again and have been happy since. They may be more expensive, but you will spend more with Luvs, changin your babies diaper after every 1 to 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good diaper, great value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these diapers for the value. I found they held up well. I used them night and day for our son, and never had any leaks. I can not vouch for "explosive" diapers. My breastfed baby does not experience these. My only complaint about the diapers is the smell. If I opened up a [new] diaper just right, the smell would remind me of old cat urine. It is not a lingering smell, and it is not overpowering. But in general, when you smell it, it can be bothersome.
customer_reviews.author: TabbieFayth

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not as good as Pampers Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in sizes one and two for my son, and they do the job, just not as well as other brands. I tried Huggies, Luvs, and Pampers, and the Pampers Sensitive are the best. These Luvs hold a single pee or poo, but that's it. You need to be on top of diaper changes if you buy these. You can get Pampers Sensitive for about 5 cents more per diaper, and it is worth absolutely every penny. Again, the Luvs will do the job, but you'll use 3x as many as you would for the Pampers and that's just not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Drift in Progress

customer_reviews.title: My fav brand
customer_reviews.text: I love that this deal is at a good price and has a lot of diapers unlike store boxes have less and still want almost the same price as amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great product. We have not had any leaking issues ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We have not had any leaking issues and they are very absorbent. I would love it if they had a wetness indicator but it is easy enough to tell by gently squeezing the diaper to see if it feels heavy. We tried other brands and were not as pleased. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love Luvs!
customer_reviews.text: I had been a Huggies mom with my first born and never used Luvs. We needed to shave a few financial corners when baby number 2 came along so I decided to try Luvs. I have to say I love Luvs! We have had less leaks since the switch and the subscription price on Amazon helps us even more with our savings!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Great diapers and SO much cheaper than most of the other brands. Only 1 blow out in 3 months and that would have blown out of any brand.
customer_reviews.author: Burbanks!

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them and the subscription price is fantastic. She is scheduled to get them on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a supscription for my daughter for her baby girl. My daughter loves them and the subscription price is fantastic. She is scheduled to get them on the 12th and the latest she has gotten them so far is the 7th. Could not be happier with either the diaper or the subscription. For the subscription price this would make an EXCELLENT gift to a new Mom. Out of everything a new Mon has to worry about the subscription takes one thing off her list. My daughter said is was the best gift she got!
customer_reviews.author: M. F. Bell

customer_reviews.title: our favorite for our 13lb baby boy
customer_reviews.text: We've used Babies R Us brand, Pampers brand, and Huggies brand, all in size newborn and size 1, and these Luvs diapers seem to have a consistent size with all the others (though Huggies are a bit smaller in comparison to the rest, I thought) and fewer leaks than the others. (Huggies and B-R-Us leaked the most, in size 1, we found, for our son; Huggies leaked the most in newborn, we thought). These also have a pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Tawn

customer_reviews.title: I like Luv's design but the material is not absorbent as ...
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this product to use in daycare. At home I use Pampers swaddlers which is the more expensive version. I like Luv's design but the material is not absorbent as Swaddlers. Since using Luv's my baby kept having accidents every time she poops. It especially leeks onto her back. I read the other similar reviews but wanted to give a try since the price is so much cheaper. Not buying Luv's again.
customer_reviews.author: Sazi, S

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: Only diapers I'll get for my LOs. Great price and product. My newborn have very sensitive skin too and these don't bother her one bit. We did have one diaper "blow out" but honestly, it would have happened in any other brand too.
customer_reviews.author: RaiderRush

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make a diaper cake and had over half a box left. They also have monkeys on them which worked out great since the theme for the shower and the nursery is Monkeys. These diapers only cost 8.00 more than a box of 100 at walmart! It is a great deal for the money!
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Baby is Allergic
customer_reviews.text: I subscribed to this product for my sister-in-law. After one box she discovered her baby was allergic and we had to switch to another brand. My youngest child is 10 years old, however, I remember having the same issue. The product is the cheapest on the market and it would appear that, that is a good thing, but why the allergic reaction???
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: did she or didn't she go?
customer_reviews.text: For my little girl I'm a big pampers fan. The blue line on them is Just so convenient. No squeezing her bum teeing to figure out if she's squishy or not. Not to mention sometimes that just squishes the poo all over her bum and lady parts. Ew. Now if LUVS found a way to make that monkey disappear when the diaper was wet or dirty that'd make it a million times better.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Boo for the new changes to these diapers!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Luvs a long time! Loved them, recommended the subscribe and save and the diapers. Now, My child is having blowout after blowout. Last night, she leaked. She is my fifth child and I have never had a leak before. Not to mention how many less diapers came in this last case. I easily found a comparable deal on Huggies..not using the s&s discount on those, either. I love having them delivered to my doors, but I don't like having to use twice as many diapers due to leaks/blowouts and the smaller case size. Very disappointed in the change of these diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I love Luvs. I have always used them with my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Luvs. I have always used them with my kids. I have found it they leak it is because they need to go up a size and not the diapers fought. They are great priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Luvs!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a mommy of 3. With my first (now 8), to be honest, I hated Luvs. Now, with my third, I was given Luvs so I gave them another shot. I'm so glad I did! They are very absorbent and cover up the pee smell. They fit my baby well and seem to be comfortable on him. He also doesn't have any leaks! Great diapers, great price!
customer_reviews.author: A. Chaney

customer_reviews.title: More rashes, cheap diapers.
customer_reviews.text: The cheapest of the diapers, so if money is an issue, these work fine. No indicator strip so figuring out a wet diaper is a bit more difficult. Nothing to cry about, but I just don't like them. Plus my daughter ended up with more diaper rashes with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Poirier

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: I threw out the generic, store brand diapers I had because they leaked and caused severe diaper rash. These diapers provide just as good of coverage against leaks as the other more expensive brands I've tried, and don't seem to be irritating my baby boy's skin. The more expensive brands do have the color change indicator to let you know when the diaper is wet, but I have learned how to tell this by feeling the diaper for fullness. I only wish Luvs made a fragrance-free option.
customer_reviews.author: Cyra-Lea Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I love Luvs diapers for my little one. He typically wears cloth diapers but he is a heavy wetter so at night he wears a disposable. I bought Luvs because the were cheap but it turns out they are held up better than the huggies that my mother in law bought. If you sign up for subscribe and safe you will be getting these diapers at a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Luvs are amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Luvs are amazing for the price. Huggies and Pampers are great but so much more expensive it's ridiculous. I stick to Luvs my daughter is 4 months and has never had a diaper rash. All kids are different though. She's only ever had a blowout when the newborns got to small.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper to date
customer_reviews.text: Best diaper to date... i have used Lyvs w my daughter 15 Yrs ago and i will only use them now w my newborn daughter. Back in the day they were the only plastic diapers still on shelf. I miss that and wish they still were. Although they are not pladtic anymore, whatever it is stays so much drier feeling than Huggies and Pampers.
customer_reviews.author: DMS22

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. I ordered two boxes of these in preparation for our baby and once my small box of Parent's Choice diapers ran out, I broke into the first box. I have had leakage with almost every bowel movement with my baby that I never had with the Parent's Choice diapers. These diapers are thin, flimsy, and, quite frankly, super ugly. I returned them because they were so terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla M. Sing

customer_reviews.title: LUVS wins this round! 100%
customer_reviews.text: Was worried because Costco, Target and walmart prices were way higher, The material is a little more stiff and not as soft, but the quality is superb, no leaks yet unlike the huggies brand that did. I was surprised. It's like $20 cheaper than the econo brands and way less than Huggies which sucks again just FYI. I am more than please at the Luvs brand and wow it's inexpensive. Thanks Luvs!
customer_reviews.author: Todd McKellips Tiny House Guy

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: good deal on diapers, saved me a fortune and they fit great! i tried the other brands for my newborn and they just didnt seem to fit right,. peed out of them, pooed out of them constantly.. then i got this value box of luvs.. cheaper, larger, better fit, keeps all that good stuff IN the diaper, not out!!
customer_reviews.author: bruinsgoddess

customer_reviews.title: They are OK.
customer_reviews.text: They are very affordable and fit well, and are more absorbent than they look. However, they have a perfume-like smell which can be quite strong, and since they don't have any elastic at the back we started having bow-outs when my baby got on the larger side of the weight range given.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: The leak guard is nice and these are perfect as overnight diapers
customer_reviews.text: My baby does well in this brand over some other name brands. There is one in particular that leaves a gel residue on him that is extremely irritating to his skin. However, this brand does not do this. The leak guard is nice and these are perfect as overnight diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri fithian

customer_reviews.title: These diapers are amazing. They are the best diapers
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are amazing. They are the best diapers. They do last 12 hours cause I put my little baby in bed and the next morning she had a full diaper but wasnt pee pee wet. Thank goodness for LUVs. 11cents a diaper for me not bad. Thx.
customer_reviews.author: melissa s.

customer_reviews.title: Blowout!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used pampers...never had any issues with pampers....but they are spendy..so decided to get luvs....won't buy again...they just don't soak up waste like pampers did...so it blows out the back more often. Guess you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: mep541

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: Don't judge the diapers by their looks, as they look hideous. However they get the job done and catches everything our little girl slings!
customer_reviews.author: Greg White

customer_reviews.title: weird faulty fastener
customer_reviews.text: At least 12 diapers had faulty fasteners. I like luvs and never had a problem with them until now (tons of diapers over the years) these would just fall off when you went to connect the fastener forcing you to get another one wasting at least 12 of them.
customer_reviews.author: justAmom

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend these diapers or any luvs products until they order ...
customer_reviews.text: They redesigned these diapers. We had to throw away the open box and return the unopened box. We have used luvs since the baby was born and since the new design we have woke up to her and her bed being soaking wet. She also developed a rash that went away as soon as we switched to another brand. I would not recommend these diapers or any luvs products until they order a recall on this new design.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J Prestenbach Jr

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is cheap and excellent if you are planning save some bucks for a ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not show the guage or line (that shows if the baby has peed)..Other than that it is cheap and excellent if you are planning save some bucks for a quality product. One thing I found as a replacement to the guage is try touching the diaper , it becomes thick after the baby pees , so it will be easier to understand.
customer_reviews.author: itsmk

customer_reviews.title: overwhelming baby powder smell
customer_reviews.text: The price is good and was just a little cheaper than the Kutkland brand. I won't be buying them again though based on the smell. When I opened the package, the smell of baby powder overwhelmed the entire nursery. It's so bad we had to put the container outside of our home to air out and, hopefully, eliminate some of the smell. It gives me headaches the smell is so strong. The small differance in cost is not worth the headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality still ok baby growing fast
customer_reviews.text: They are a good functional diaper with no issues. The price point per unit was the deciding factor. Pampers your too high. Amazon please put the coupons out there babies are expensive
customer_reviews.author: P. C. HEDSTROM

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like these. The price is good
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these. The price is good. But they just do not hold up. Every single day my daughter has a diaper blowout, sometimes epic ones. The fit is right, the product is just not effective. I've switched brands and plan on taking luvs up on the "money back guarantee."
customer_reviews.author: A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Diapers
customer_reviews.text: These are great diapers. I love the fact that they come in such a large pack. We go through a lot of diapers as baby gets rashes easily and likes to go potty just after we change her. We have had less problems with leaking with these as well, they seem to fit a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: THESE DIAPERS LEAK!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these for my new niece. When she was finally big enough to use these diapers we made a horrible discovery. THEY LEAK! my niece is not a gentle pooper. My sister tried everything to keep these diapers form leaking but she inevitably ended up with poop all over her and the baby. THESE DIAPERS ARE TERRIBLE!!! I bought her the 264 pack so she is stuck with them for atlas a month! Would really like my money back.
customer_reviews.author: jason tang

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for my baby and the leaking protection is absolutely ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for my baby and the leaking protection is absolutely true! I'd only add a line that tells you when it needs to be changed! Every other brand has it and I found it very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: Best diapers it had been 8 years since my last ...
customer_reviews.text: Best diapers it had been 8 years since my last child. The hospital used huggies so naturally I went and bought them. Didn't even use the whole box before I remembered that I previously used luvs. No more leaks especially at night and no more seeping poo. These really are the best diapers. They came fast and cost me the same as store
customer_reviews.author: Jodee Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as Pampers or Huggies but they aren’t far worse. Its pretty good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No leaks, great value for the best price
customer_reviews.text: These are good, not great but a great value. Never had a leaky diaper but there is no indication of a dirty diaper. Material is a little bit like plastic, not as soft as PAMPERS but soft enough. A lot more come in a box of these LUVS than the other brands. Overall very pleased with these LUVS diapers.
customer_reviews.author: United V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great diapers. They don't leak through or give my kids a rash. I've always used these over other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the diaper is blue and has scent I started using these in the night and by the am my baby was chemical burnt on her skin. No open soars but red and irritated. I wouldnt recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Diamond

customer_reviews.title: now I am either going to have to get rid of these or use them and hate the smell of my baby
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere did the description say these are scented with an overpowering and very synthetic/perfume baby fragrance. I never buy anything with artificial scents because I am sensitive to them and so is my son...now I am either going to have to get rid of these or use them and hate the smell of my baby...I think I will just get rid of them. Such a waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Had a scent, and caused rash
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were non-scented, but they did have a strong powdered smell, and gave my baby an irritated butt. On a positive note, these diapers are very affordable, and provided all-night-long leak protection... super absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than the rest, but cheap in quality as well.
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not write a product review on amazon, mostly because we are usually satisfied with what we buy. I'm writing this one so that other customers are sufficiently warned. Our primary concerns with this product: 1) We bought size 1 diapers for our 2 month old baby and it is quite tight inspite of the baby's weight being within the prescribed range on the box. The baby has diaper prints on the inner thighs and is usually uncomfortable in these diapers. 2) Frequent leakage issues 3) No wetness indicator
customer_reviews.author: Veena Unni

customer_reviews.title: Luvs quality takes a dive
customer_reviews.text: I loved luvs until now. I used them exclusively for my first child and planned to do the same with my 4 month old. However, in the past month they have changed their diapers to thinner, inferior diapers AND raised the prices. They used to keep her dry through a full night's sleep, but now if we put her to bed in luvs, she wakes up soaked head to toe. We are switching to pampers, sadly since luvs used to be so much more bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Foy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would've discovered this sooner great quality and much cheaper than my local store brands
customer_reviews.text: Biggest box of diapers I've ever bought!! Wish I would've discovered this sooner great quality and much cheaper than my local store brands!
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: I hate wasting.
customer_reviews.text: leakgard.... nope my 3 month old would soal and leak after each change (2-3 hours) im assuming they know this and that's why they give you so many diapers ib one box I was so irritated that I had finished all of 250, I hate wasting.....
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: but so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby got this one. I'm a Huggies kinda mom, I've found that Luvs leaks easier, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon F.

customer_reviews.title: For the new mommy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my niece who just had a baby. I never had kids so I've never had to think about what diapers to get. Well, turns out these are her favorite brands and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mugsy

customer_reviews.title: Lack of indicator makes extra works for the parents to ...
customer_reviews.text: Lack of indicator makes extra works for the parents to check the baby whether or not the baby has peed or pupped unlike other products such as pampers and huggies which comes with the indicators to let the parents know about the baby's passing of stools or pees.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS A GREAT VALUE for a gift that had free shipping
customer_reviews.author: gilrozo

customer_reviews.title: We love Luvs!
customer_reviews.text: We love Luvs b/c they're the best bang for the buck. They work well for our two boys and are very cost efficient. Also, the Amazon subscribe and save has been very helpful. The diapers always ship quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Fit my son well. Have not experienced any leaking. Smells lightly of baby powder, I was worried it would irritate my newborns skin but no problems yet. My husband misses having the strip that tells you the diaper is wet. Good price and fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I love it and my baby girl does too
customer_reviews.text: I love it and my baby girl does too :) It has some pretty cool blow out protection aka leakbuard. Though it doesn't protect from a vertical blowout but certainly hold everything on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Husband, Dad, and Entrepreneur

customer_reviews.title: The diapers are fine, but I'm disappointed that they have a powder ...
customer_reviews.text: The diapers are fine, but I'm disappointed that they have a powder scent. We avoid artificial scents esp. w/ the children.
customer_reviews.author: E. D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: I did like the product although the diapers were thin and not ...
customer_reviews.text: I did like the product although the diapers were thin and not like normal diapers Huggies etc. they were good they absorb just as well as any other diaper
customer_reviews.author: Heather OGrady

customer_reviews.title: Great Price when on sale
customer_reviews.text: I don't LOVE Luvs but these were on sale for a price I couldn't beat. I usually buy the target brand which is by far my favorite but Luvs are a cheap alternative and they do the job they are ment for.
customer_reviews.author: cRex2980

customer_reviews.title: Work great. At first I noticed a fragrant smell to ...
customer_reviews.text: Work great. At first I noticed a fragrant smell to mask the poop/pee smell and I wasn't too fond of it. But once they were out of the plastic for a few days it had gone away. Not as soft inside as Pampers or Huggies but a good value on a tight budget. I got these for $0.10/ea so 2 to 3 times cheaper than the other two brands. My son had no reactions to them either.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Do not like. Huggies so much better
customer_reviews.text: Chemical deodorant smell. My baby gets rashes from these. Do not like. Huggies so much better. It's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: botanicazilla

customer_reviews.title: ... but when your watching your spending this is a good choice. Worked great for my little girl
customer_reviews.text: I would choose Huggies over Luvs but when your watching your spending this is a good choice. Worked great for my little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Kari S.

customer_reviews.title: Such a time saver!
customer_reviews.text: They work so great. I love this size of this box! I love that I can order them and they are shipped directly to the house and I don't have to try to carry baby and diapers into the house!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite of all brands of diapers
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite of all brands of diapers. I've been using Luvs for 4.5 years and with each kid, I test other brands to see what works best for my kid and always come back to Luvs.
customer_reviews.author: Tali Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Money Saver
customer_reviews.text: This was a great value. It lasted us the whole month. They are less stretchy than other brands. My son is now 12.5 pounds and I don't think he will still be able to wear them till 14 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Lekeya A Irby

customer_reviews.title: Irritating perfume scent
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed got these diapers because the price was great and they seem to get decent reviews however the smell of the perfume is so overwhelming it's giving me a headache and irritating my sons skin. I'm planning on returning them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these LUVS!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I liked the luvs so much we returned the pampers baby dry to get more LUVS. We had a baby boy so IDK if these are good for boys and not girls but I have zero complaints and only compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that it doesn't have a line that changes colors to easily tell if the diaper is wet. Otherwise, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these diapers for my twins!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only diapers my little twins will not pee through at night. Theyve been great sleepers since we brought them home!! They are five months now and this is the only diapers that work for them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My go to diapers. They are very durable and it does not hurt that they are inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: We went back to pampers with our twins, these ...
customer_reviews.text: We went back to pampers with our twins, these just didnt seem to last as long, and we had more blow outs with these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Good diapers
customer_reviews.text: Loved using these for my baby! They fit well and my baby seemed comfortable in them until she grew out of them. This was an excellent deal for a box of diapers when I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: kestrelphyre

customer_reviews.title: Better than Pampers!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed...works better than Pampers at keeping my daughter's "explosions" from leaking!!! Excellent diaper, and cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Wildberry

customer_reviews.title: Super Super Super
customer_reviews.text: Super Super Super.Best I have 4 children and use few different com. Luvs best quallity and price no alergy. Never change luvs.!!!
customer_reviews.author: OM

customer_reviews.title: Love these diapers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these diapers! My baby has never peed of of them like she has with huggies. These fit like pampers but for a lot less $$.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Best value!
customer_reviews.text: I love them, very thin - you can keep 3 in your purse without adding too much bulk and are excellent at not leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive than the name brands. What do you ...
customer_reviews.text: Less expensive than the name brands. What do you lose? Well, these Luvs do not have the wet/dry indicator stripe. However, we have found that the outer material on these is more waterproof (thus less soak-through) than the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Gen Contractor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting on baby to arrive, but mommy already used these and greatly approves.
customer_reviews.author: Gailedge

customer_reviews.title: cheap and dependable
customer_reviews.text: way cheaper and works better than the low grade huggies snug and dry. super absorbent and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cheung

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL DIAPERS. very similar to pampers
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL DIAPERS. very similar to pampers, but in my personal experience offers much more protection. The only thing I don't like it how strong the perfume is.
customer_reviews.author: Z.G.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy. I mean 252 diapers for 32 bucks is a lot cheaper than buying them at the store with less in a box and almost just as expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor H.

customer_reviews.title: I sent this to a friend expecting a baby.
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to a friend expecting a baby. They were very impressed by the large size of the box
customer_reviews.author: sarah diana

customer_reviews.title: Great price and no leaks
customer_reviews.text: We have been very impressed with the price and quality of these diapers. We have used smugglers and swaddlers and these are just as good but way cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome diapers! Our babies rarely had leaks in these
customer_reviews.author: Kori McKee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love these for use overnight. No leaking and no blow-outs unlike some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: PBJ

customer_reviews.title: saved some money, when compared to spending on Pampers ...
customer_reviews.text: saved some money, when compared to spending on Pampers. But Dont Expect the same Quality & Comfort that Pampers give. I use it for my baby in the day time only. because, it cant take much of fluids when using long nights.
customer_reviews.author: Raghavendra Tallam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the baby dry like they are suppose to. We would not expect anything less
customer_reviews.author: cody oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the only diaper that has ever fit my preemie twins
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay for a brand naame
customer_reviews.text: Best diapers for the price by far. Love that they were part of Prime and they were shipped in 2 days. So much better than lugging your kids to the store. Will always buy Luvs and always Prime.
customer_reviews.author: mlcs

customer_reviews.title: Its a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little worried that they might leak since they were so cheap but they have been GREAT! Good Price and keeps my son dry you cant beat it!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan McNertney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. don't leak, can't find this size box in stores. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: edward sarty

customer_reviews.title: I love Luvs. Great price
customer_reviews.text: I love Luvs. Great price, great absorbency, and they fit baby comfortably. They also have a clean baby powder fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: 3 Honeys

customer_reviews.title: I do not love the diapers
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars for CHEAP. I do not love the diapers, they are very strong smelling.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: They loved it. Also
customer_reviews.text: I have this service set up to deliver diapers to my new grandson. It works so well for my son and daughter-love. We sent it as a gift for Christmas. They loved it. Also, it is easy to change as the baby grows.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri A. Jones

product_meta.title: luvs diapers, size 1, 252 count
product_meta.description: luvs has nightlock our largest absorbency area ever to lok away wetnes even over night
feature_bullets: NightLock: Our largest absorbency area ever helps lock away leaks, even overnight.
